item.title: 瑞士信贷银行倒闭后，瑞士计划提高银行安全性
item.description: 瑞士周三提出了针对瑞银集团和其他三家系统性相关银行的建议，旨在保护该国避免重蹈去年瑞士信贷银行倒闭的覆辙。【原文：Switzerland put forward on Wednesday proposals for UBS and three other systemically relevant banks aimed at protecting the country from a repeat of last year's Credit Suisse collapse.】

item.title: 瑞银在瑞士应对瑞士信贷救援时将面临更严格的规定
item.description: 瑞士政府周三表示，在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）获救一年后，瑞银和其他三家系统性相关银行必须面对更严格的资本要求，以保护瑞士更广泛的经济。【原文：Switzerland's government said on Wednesday that UBS and three other systemically relevant banks must face tougher capital requirements to shield the country's wider economy, a year after the rescue of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，如果不进行生产力改革，世界将面临持续低增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）周三表示，除非进行重大改革以提高生产力和利用人工智能等技术，否则到2030年全球经济增长率将仅达到2.8%，比历史平均水平低整整一个百分点。【原文：Global economic growth will reach just 2.8% by 2030, a full percentage point below the historical average, unless major reforms are made to boost productivity and leverage technologies such as artificial intelligence, the IMF said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟将针对中国扭曲行为的贸易指南扩展至新领域
item.description: 欧盟委员会更新了其关于中国经济中由国家主导的扭曲现象的报告，增加了新的行业，并可能为欧盟芯片和清洁技术生产商的反倾销投诉敞开大门。【原文：The European Commission has updated its report on state-led distortions in the Chinese economy, adding new sectors and potentially opening the door to anti-dumping complaints from EU chip and clean-tech producers.】

item.title: 德国 Galeria 公司出售给美国投资者 Baker 和 Beetz 财团
item.description: 德国零售商 Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof 周三表示，将由美国投资者理查德-贝克（Richard Baker）和德国商人贝恩德-贝茨（Bernd Beetz）组成的财团接管。【原文：Germany's Galeria Karstadt Kaufhof is to be taken over by a consortium of U.S. investor Richard Baker and German businessman Bernd Beetz, the retailer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 达美航空看好创纪录的旅行需求前景
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）因旅游需求旺盛，第一季度盈利超过华尔街预期，该公司周三对本季度业绩作出乐观展望。【原文：Delta Air Lines on Wednesday offered an upbeat outlook for the current quarter after its first-quarter earnings topped Wall Street estimates on buoyant travel demand.】

item.title: 美国银行利润下滑，关注点转向利息收入前景
item.description: 随着美国银行业巨头准备公布略低的第一季度利润，投资者将重点关注高管们预计今年利息支出将增加多少收入。【原文：As U.S. banking giants prepare to report slightly lower first-quarter profits, investors will focus on how much more income executives expect from interest payments this year.】

item.title: 泰国央行维持关键利率不变，无视政府要求降息的呼吁
item.description: 泰国央行周三连续第三次会议维持关键利率不变，抵制了政府一再发出的降低借贷成本以帮助振兴东南亚第二大经济体的呼吁。【原文：Thailand's central bank left its key interest rate unchanged for a third straight meeting on Wednesday, resisting repeated calls by the government to lower borrowing costs to help revive Southeast Asia's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 经济萎靡不振，欧洲企业纷纷裁员
item.description: 数十年来最高的通货膨胀率和乌克兰战争的影响迫使欧洲各地的公司裁员或冻结招聘。【原文：The highest inflation for decades and the impact of the war in Ukraine have forced companies across Europe into layoffs or hiring freezes.】

item.title: 2023 年，雪佛龙首席执行官的薪酬将增长 12%，达到 2,650 万美元
item.description: 周三的一份证券文件显示，美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司首席执行官迈克尔-沃思 2023 年的薪酬为 2650 万美元，比上年增长 12.2%。【原文：U.S. oil major Chevron's CEO Michael Wirth was paid $26.5 million in 2023, a 12.2% increase from the prior year, a securities filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 期货在最新通胀测试前走高
item.description: 周三，在可能影响美联储今年货币政策走向的重要通胀数据公布之前，美国股指期货走高。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday in the lead up to a crucial inflation reading that could influence the Federal Reserve's monetary policy path this year.】

item.title: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席誓言在新任期内 "大力倡导 "安全
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席珍妮弗-霍曼迪（Jennifer Homendy）将告诉立法者，她致力于争取安全建议获得批准，并对联邦机构进行严格审查。【原文：National Transportation Safety Board chair Jennifer Homendy will tell lawmakers she is committed to winning approval of safety recommendations and scrutinizing federal agencies.】

item.title: 通胀数据表现不佳，美联储降息信心动摇
item.description: 随着美联储官员去年开始引导全球在 2024 年进行可能的降息，他们对数据感到欣慰，这些数据显示，多个月来的通胀率已跌至美国央行 2% 的目标，这证明他们的政策正在抑制仍然过热的经济。【原文：As Federal Reserve officials last year started steering the world towards possible interest rate cuts in 2024, they took heart in data showing inflation over many months had collapsed to the U.S. central bank's 2% target, evidence their policies were curbing a still too-hot economy.】

item.title: 早间新闻警惕 CPI、加拿大决定、中国信贷警告
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称福特将在美国召回 4 万多辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周三表示，福特将在美国召回42,652辆Bronco Sport和Escape汽车，原因是这些汽车的喷油器破裂，可能会泄漏并引发火灾。【原文：Ford will recall 42,652 Bronco Sport and Escape vehicles in the United States due to cracked fuel injectors that may leak and cause a fire, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯法院驳回谷歌就乌克兰内容被罚 5000 万美元提出的上诉
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司因未能删除俄罗斯认为有关乌克兰战争的虚假信息而被处以 46 亿卢布（约合 4940 万美元）的罚款，俄罗斯一家法院表示已驳回谷歌公司的上诉。【原文：A Russian court said it had rejected an appeal by Alphabet's Google against a 4.6 billion rouble ($49.4 million) fine, imposed for failing to delete what Russia considers to be fake information about the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 保时捷报告第一季度交付量下降 4
item.description: 总部位于斯图加特的跑车制造商保时捷周三表示，与2023年相比，2024年第一季度的全球汽车交付量减少了4%，原因是中国市场面临挑战，以及北美地区与海关相关的交付延迟。【原文：Stuttgart-based sportscar maker Porsche delivered 4% fewer vehicles globally in the first quarter of 2024 compared to 2023, it said on Wednesday, citing a challenging market in China and customs-related delivery delays in North America.】

item.title: 灰度公司首席执行官认为比特币 ETF 资金外流已达到平衡状态
item.description: 加密资产管理公司灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments）首席执行官迈克尔-桑纳夏恩（Michael Sonnenshein）在最新一期《ETFs内幕》节目中告诉路透社，经过几个月的投资者抛售，灰度比特币信托基金的资金外流可能正在达到平衡。【原文：Outflows from the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust may be reaching an equilibrium after months of investor selling, Michael Sonnenshein, CEO of crypto asset manager Grayscale Investments, told Reuters on the latest episode of Inside ETFs.】

item.title: 大众汽车第一季度交付量增长
item.description: 德国汽车制造商大众汽车公司今年前三个月的汽车交付量略有上升，在中国、北美和南美均实现了增长。【原文：German carmaker Volkswagen saw a slight rise in vehicle deliveries during the first three months of the year, as it recorded a growth in China as well as North and South America】

item.title: 亚洲供应瓶颈导致梅赛德斯-奔驰第一季度销量下滑
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes Benz）周三表示，受亚洲供应瓶颈和豪华车型系列转换的影响，该公司第一季度的销量下降了 6%。【原文：Mercedes Benz sales fell 6% in the first quarter, hit by supply bottlenecks in Asia and its luxury model range changeover, the German premium carmaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，香港将于四月批准首批现货比特币 ETF
item.description: 两位熟知内情的人士称，现货比特币交易所交易基金可能于本月在香港推出，首批审批结果可能于下周公布。【原文：Spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds could be launched in Hong Kong this month with the first approvals likely to be announced next week, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 行业组织称中国汽车厂产能增长不快
item.description: 中国汽车工业协会（CAAM）的一位高级官员周三表示，中国汽车工厂的产能增长不快，闲置产能反而被关闭。【原文：Chinese auto factories' capacity is not growing fast and idled capacity is being closed instead, a senior official at the China Association of Automobile Manufacturers (CAAM) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社称，ByteDance 全年利润猛增 60
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引知情人士的话报道称，TikTok 的所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）2023 年的利润增长了约 60%。【原文：TikTok-owner ByteDance's profit jumped roughly 60% in 2023, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 宝马集团第一季度销售额略有增长
item.description: 宝马集团周三表示，今年第一季度共交付汽车 594,671 辆，同比增长 1.1%。【原文：The BMW Group delivered 594,671 vehicles in the first quarter of the year, the carmaker said on Wednesday, a rise of 1.1% year-on-year.】

item.title: 日本 Seven & i 公司称正考虑出售超市业务
item.description: 日本零售商 Seven & i Holdings 周三表示，作为企业价值最大化计划的一部分，该公司正在考虑将其主要由超市组成的商超业务上市。【原文：Japanese retailer Seven & i Holdings said on Wednesday it was considering a listing of its superstore business, which is mainly comprised of supermarkets, as part of a plan to maximise corporate value.】

item.title: 英国乐购在建立 "强劲势头 "后预计利润增长
item.description: 英国最大的零售商乐购（Tesco）预测，由于强劲的需求和新客户的加入，2023/24 财年的利润将进一步增长 11%。【原文：Tesco , Britain's biggest retailer, forecast a further increase in profit in its new financial year as strong demand and new customers helped it to post an 11% jump in 2023/24.】

item.title: 巴里卡乐宝营业利润因转型计划而下降
item.description: 全球最大的巧克力生产商巴里-卡乐堡公司（Barry Callebaut）周三公布的半年营业利润低于预期，原因是其转型计划造成了一次性支出。【原文：Barry Callebaut , the world's biggest chocolate maker, reported lower than expected half-year operating profit on Wednesday, hit by one-off expenses caused by its transformation plan.】

item.title: 早间竞标焦急等待美国通胀
item.description: Vidya Ranganathan 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Vidya Ranganathan】

item.title: 向中国发出工厂产能警告后，耶伦面临关税抉择
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）在对广州和北京进行为期四天的访问期间，向中国经济领导人发出严厉警告，称他们对清洁能源产品工厂产能的过度投资是不可接受的。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen hammered home a stern warning to China's economic leaders that their overinvestment in factory capacity for clean energy goods is unacceptable throughout her four-day visit to Guangzhou and Beijing.】

item.title: 基金抛售期权有助于缓和美股波动
item.description: 出售期权以获取收益的热门基金可能会缓和近期美股的波动，延续其在过去几个月中对市场产生的镇定作用。【原文：Popular funds that sell options for income may be moderating the recent bout of volatility in U.S. stocks, extending the calming effect they have had on the market for the last several months.】
